description: Ask the U.S. Flag Status skill for the status of the State and National flags in a given state.  It will respond with whether or not the flags are at half staff and if so will include details and duration.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Flag Status for South Dakota
Alexa, ask Flag Status why are the flags at half staff in Minnesota
Alexa, ask Flag Status why is the U.S. flag at half staff in North Dakota
imageAltText: United States Flag Status Skill icon
name: United States Flag Status Skill
shortDescription: With U.S. Flag Status skill you can find out whether or not the State and National flags are flying at half staff today and why.
